response.overview: On routine Patrol and armed with a tip to check a local warehouse, SG finds a local lowlife rummaging around. After a brief altercation, she adjusts his attitude for him and goes about her business. Days later, she's on an assignment helping the local authorities. There have been reports of unidentifiable sounds coming from a building downtown. She enters and isn't surprised at all to find what appears to be a demon or creature making a temporary home. She tries to convince the creature to come with her, but nothing seems to work. Her powers don't work, her punches seem to bounce off it's super strong frame, and she can hardly even move it. It swings at her and connects, and the pain is surprising and almost intolerable. She's concerned but decides to give it a good fight. She has no idea what she's in for.
response.title: No Hope
